_comment: Created by ianb on 08/10/2013 13:51:21 using v0.9
title: How have rates of community VTE changed?
analysis_commentary: Incidence of VTEs are higher in acute settings, with an average of 1.1% of all sampled patients having a VTE recorded in the time period, compared to 0.4% in community. Incidence of VTEs in a community setting decreased from 0.4% of sampled patients in April 2012 to 0.3% of patients in April 2013.
data_source: Health & Social Care Information Centre, NHS Safety Thermometer
